author: Drew707
body: CDW has their list price as $3,300.  But it does come with a microfiber for cleaning it.  The more I think about this device, the more absurd it is.  It is essentially a Yealink T56, but 10x the price for a bigger monitor.  I am pretty sure the Yealink has HDMI out, too.  It is the same price as my Surface Book 2, my dock, mouse, keyboard, two monitors and monitor stand, and I can run Webex along with it being a real computer.
